gameplay.title: Gameplay Gallery
gameplay.subtitle: Run a cafe by day, explore dreams by night!

videos.desc1: HIPS N NOSES is a unique blend of cafe management simulation and action roguelike gameplay. By night, dive into the dream world to battle monsters and gather rare ingredients. By day, run your cafe and help customers recover their lost memories.
videos.desc2: Every customer has their own unique tastes and preferences. Pick up on hints from your conversations to customize and perfect your recipes with the finest ingredients. Satisfy even the pickiest customers to earn bigger rewards and profits.
videos.desc3: The ever-shifting dream world offers fresh experiences with every visit. People you meet in reality appear in your dreams, fighting alongside you against countless monsters to collect rare ingredients you can't find anywhere else.
videos.desc4: Upgrade your cafe with new kitchen equipment, build relationships with a diverse cast of customers, and grow stronger by conquering dream monsters. This progression system lets you serve more customers more efficiently while adding depth and lasting replayability.
